D

DatabaseConnection - Class in utils
This class is a singleton class which perform a database connection and also can perform some operations at the database.
DatabaseConnection() - Constructor for class utils.DatabaseConnection
The constructor tries to connect to the database.
DatabaseConnectionTest - Class in tests
Created by loster on 21.07.2015.
DatabaseConnectionTest() - Constructor for class tests.DatabaseConnectionTest
 
dealBoardCards() - Method in class game.Game
draws cards every round to the board (table) burns a card before every draw if zero cards on the table draw 3 if there are three cards on the table draw 1 if there are four cards on the table draw 1 and set last round sends a push notification to all players with the board cards
dealCards() - Method in class game.Game
gives every player two cards from the CardStack
DIAMONDS - Static variable in class utils.Constants.Cards.Symbols
 
do_bet(RoomList, JSONObject, User) - Method in class interfaces.PokerInterface
This method perform a bet if the user is at turn
do_call(RoomList, User) - Method in class interfaces.PokerInterface
This method perform a call if the user is at turn
do_check(RoomList, User) - Method in class interfaces.PokerInterface
This method perform a check if the user is at turn
do_fold(RoomList, User) - Method in class interfaces.PokerInterface
This method perform a fold if the user is at turn
do_not_authorize - Variable in class interfaces.PokerInterface
 
do_raise(RoomList, JSONObject, User) - Method in class interfaces.PokerInterface
This method perform a raise if the user is at turn
doBet(User, int) - Method in class game.Game
does a bet for the given User add the bet to the pod sets the last action that was made to a bet sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
doCall(User) - Method in class game.Game
does a call for the given User add the amount of the last bet to the pod sets the last action that was made to a call sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
doCheck(User) - Method in class game.Game
does a check for the given User is only possible if the action before was a check or he is the first player sets the last action that was made to a check sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
doFold(User) - Method in class game.Game
does a fold for the given User his last action is set to fold
doRaise(User, int) - Method in class game.Game
does a raise for the given User.
